label: WS900-29
description: Wireless Alarm System with Integrated Home Automation

metadata.inclusion:
1. Visit the Alarm.com dealer site.
2. Navigate to the Equipment page.
3. Click the emPower Devices tab.
4. Open the Advanced Z-Wave Commands menu below the Equipment List.
5. Click Add Z-Wave Devices.
6. Trigger a device to add it to the network.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Visit the Alarm.com dealer site.
2. Navigate to the Equipment page.
3. Click the emPower Devices tab.
4. Open the Advanced Z-Wave Commands menu below the Equipment List.
5. Click Remove Z-Wave Devices.
6. Trigger a device to remove it from the network.
metadata.reset:
1. Log into the Partner Portal at https://alarmadmin.alarm.com/default.aspx and select a customer.
2. Navigate to the 'Equipment' page.
3. Click the 'emPower Devices' tab.
4. Expand the 'Advanced Z-Wave Commands' box.
5. Click the 'Remove All Z-Wave Devices' button.
6. Allow 3 minutes for the associated commands to go through and for the device to act on them.
